title: Investment Tax Credit (ITC) Analysis
description: A tax analyst needs to determine the eligible Investment Tax Credit for a new solar-plus-storage project and its impact on the project's financial returns.

tasks.description: Determine the current federal and state ITC rates applicable to solar and energy storage projects.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the correct tax credit percentages.

tasks.description: Calculate the total eligible project cost basis and the resulting tax credit amount in dollars.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent computes the total tax credit value.

tasks.description: Update the project's financial model to include the ITC, and recalculate the project's after-tax IRR and NPV.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent shows that the ITC increases the IRR by 200 basis points.
